title: 14. Storage Capacity :
sample_text:
Notwithstanding anything contained in the policy, it is hereby declared and agreed that the maximum
capacity of the cold storage chambers shall be determined on the basis that ten quintals of potatoes can be
stored per one hundred cubic feet of space inside the chamber and the insured shall not store any quantity
in excess of the capacity as determined.
